backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor managing user profiles, directory search, conversations, messages, and call logs with authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping feature IDs to related frontend files, components, test IDs, and confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for numerous frontend files describing their roles in routing, UI, hooks, and messaging logic.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and base styling tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining root element and loading the main frontend script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring routes, auth gating, layout, and navigation using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageList: Renders chat messages with sender labeling, timestamps, and support for both text and video message types.
frontend/src/components/chat/VideoMessag: Displays a video message with playback, optional text, and interactive star-rating for video content.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Layout component providing header, navigation, and user menu based on authentication state.
frontend/src/components/system/StateView: Provides loading, error, and empty-state UI components with optional actions.
frontend/src/components/video/StarRating: Interactive star rating component supporting half-stars, hover effects, and read‑only mode.
frontend/src/components/video/VideoRecor: Camera-based video recorder using MediaRecorder with UI for starting/stopping recording and handling permissions.
frontend/src/components/video/VideoTrimm: Allows trimming uploaded videos with sliders and offers export or send-to-chat actions.
frontend/src/components/video/VideoUploa: Handles selecting and validating video files before passing them to a parent component.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to user identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAddConversation.ts: Mutation hook to add a conversation via the actor and invalidate related queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useCallHistory.ts: Fetches call history from the actor with periodic polling and actor-aware loading state.
frontend/src/hooks/useConversations.ts: Loads user conversations from the backend, mapping IDs to UI-friendly objects and polling periodically.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Fetches the current user's profile from the backend using their identity and caches it with react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeleteCallEntry.ts: Provides a mutation to delete a call log entry with optimistic updates and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, exposes login/logout, and restores identities via an auth client.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfileMutations.t: Defines mutations to create and update user profiles and handles related cache invalidation and error messaging.
frontend/src/hooks/useRemoveConversation: Supplies a mutation to remove a conversation and refreshes related queries with error‑specific toasts.
frontend/src/hooks/useSendMessage.ts: Provides a mutation to send a message to a conversation and invalidates message and conversation caches.
frontend/src/hooks/useThemePreference.ts: Stores and applies per‑user theme presets, syncing selections to localStorage and CSS variables.
frontend/src/hooks/useThreadMessages.ts: Fetches and maps backend messages for a conversation, polling periodically for updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Loads a public user profile for a given principal and formats it for UI use.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserSearch.ts: Searches for users matching a query string and returns mapped results when at least three characters are provided.
frontend/src/hooks/useVideoRating.ts: Retrieves mocked video rating data and provides a mutation to set ratings with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes including custom accent colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/ActiveCallPage.tsx: Implements an active call UI with simulated connection state, video placeholders, timers, and call controls.
frontend/src/pages/CallsPage.tsx: Displays recent call history with filtering, formatting, deletion, and navigation to start new calls.
frontend/src/pages/ChatsPage.tsx: Lists user conversations with metadata, navigation, and options to remove conversations.
frontend/src/pages/ChatThreadPage.tsx: Shows a scrolling chat thread, loads and sends messages, and manages auto‑scroll and participant display.
frontend/src/pages/DirectoryPage.tsx: Provides user search with validation and allows starting new chats or calls from search results.
Renders onboarding form for creating a user profile with username/display name validation and submission.
frontend/src/pages/IncomingCallPage.tsx: Displays an incoming call screen allowing users to accept or decline a call based on callId.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Provides UI for updating profile info and theme preferences, syncing form state with current user data.
frontend/src/pages/UserProfilePage.tsx: Shows another user's profile and enables starting a chat or call after loading their data.
frontend/src/pages/VideoStudioPage.tsx: Implements a tabbed interface for recording, uploading, and editing videos using shared video components.
frontend/src/utils/conversationMeta.ts: Utility functions for creating, parsing, validating, and labeling conversation IDs based on principals.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom color tokens, container settings, extended animations, and plugin integration.
project_state.json: JSON snapshot of project requirements, features, issues, and overall app goals for messaging, calling, video tools, and theming.
